channel.title: Hackathon on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Hackathon on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Social Humanities DataHack event
item.description: How do people represent themselves on social media, and how are they represented by others? Which qualities and virtues are emphasized (or ignored)? How polarised are these (re)presentations? There is a workshop looking at this very question happening in Oxford in early January. The morning will be a series of workshops on tools for tackling a question like the above (I’m thinking of attending the Wikipedia and Topic Modelling workshop), and the afternoon will be a hackathon looking at some data sets.
